entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:14 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -27.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 01:54 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -27.2°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -30.2°C
Wind: NE 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
